about.title: Some about me
about.paragraph_one: Hey! What's up? I'm Camilo, a 22-year-old technology enthusiast from Colombia. My passion for technology has driven me to become a self-taught Full Stack Developer, and to learn some things about UI/UX design.
about.paragraph_two: I am a student majoring in IT at the university. Some of my other passions include reading, eating, and going to the gym. I consider myself someone who is well-organized and a bit of a perfectionist.

contact.title: Contact
contact.socials_text: If you want to know me some more, take a look at my social media.
contact.resume_text: Take a look at my CV, feel free to contact me if i meet your requirements.
